law.text:
The Board shall advise, consult with, propose, and recommend to the Commissioner reasonable regulations:
to prevent conditions that are detrimental to safety and health in each employment or place of employment in the State; and
that the Board finds are necessary to protect and to improve the safety and health of employees on the basis of circumstantial evidence and information that:
is developed by the Commissioner;
is available to the Commissioner; or
is submitted by an interested person to the Board at a public hearing held under § 5-310(d) of this subtitle.
